EDIT:

Ahha. I see, you used the Klaw. Very nicely done, intriguing!
If the probe was on the engine pod, then it would be more gimbally...
Hahaha. Love it. Have a kerbal snack.
Excellent work! That looks magnificent- your next challenge will be to put that on a real spacefaring rocket!

I also made a two-claw version where I dropped one bit with a claw from above and then dropped that joined piece onto another claw below. That gave a gimbal with 90 deg of movement. But its a tad more complicated and I still haven't figured out what I'm going to do with the first one .
